Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.FilterCache
    Use QueryCache instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.FilterCachingPolicy
    Use QueryCachingPolicy instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.CachingWrapperFilter
    Use CachingWrapperQuery and BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.index.DocsAndPositionsEnum
    Use PostingsEnum instead.
    org.apache.lucene.index.DocsEnum
    Use PostingsEnum instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.DocTermOrdsRewriteMethod
    Use DocValuesRewriteMethod instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.FieldValueFilter
    Use FieldValueQuery instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.FilteredQuery
    FilteredQuery will be removed in Lucene 6.0. It should be replaced with a BooleanQuery with one BooleanClause.Occur.MUST clause for the query and one BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clause for the filter.
    org.apache.lucene.search.LRUFilterCache
    Use LRUQueryCache instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.MultiTermQueryWrapperFilter
    Use MultiTermQueryConstantScoreWrapper instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.NumericRangeFilter
    Use NumericRangeQuery and BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.payloads.PayloadNearQuery
    use PayloadScoreQuery to wrap SpanNearQuery
    org.apache.lucene.search.payloads.PayloadTermQuery
    use PayloadScoreQuery to wrap SpanTermQuery
    org.apache.lucene.search.PrefixFilter
    Use PrefixQuery and BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.payloads.SpanNearPayloadCheckQuery
    Use SpanPayloadCheckQuery
    org.apache.lucene.search.TermRangeFilter
    Use TermRangeQuery and BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead.
    org.apache.lucene.analysis.Token
    This class is outdated and no longer used since Lucene 2.9. Nuke it finally!
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field.Index
    This is here only to ease transition from the pre-4.0 APIs.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field.TermVector
    This is here only to ease transition from the pre-4.0 APIs.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.lucene.util.IOUtils.CHARSET_UTF_8
    Use StandardCharsets.UTF_8 instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.MultiTermQuery.CONSTANT_SCORE_BOOLEAN_QUERY_REWRITE
    old name of MultiTermQuery.CONSTANT_SCORE_BOOLEAN_REWRITE
    org.apache.lucene.search.MultiTermQuery.CONSTANT_SCORE_FILTER_REWRITE
    old name of MultiTermQuery.CONSTANT_SCORE_REWRITE
    org.apache.lucene.search.FuzzyQuery.defaultMinSimilarity
    pass integer edit distances instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.Version.LUCENE_4_0
    Bad naming of constant; use Version.LUCENE_4_0_0 instead (this constant actually points to Version.LUCENE_4_0_0_ALPHA to match whole 4.0 series).

    Use SleepingLockWrapper if you want sleeping.

    Use SleepingLockWrapper if you want sleeping.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery.add(BooleanClause)
    Boolean queries should be created once with BooleanQuery.Builder and then considered immutable. See BooleanQuery.Builder.add(org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanClause).
    org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery.add(Query, BooleanClause.Occur)
    Boolean queries should be created once with BooleanQuery.Builder and then considered immutable. See BooleanQuery.Builder.add(org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanClause).
    org.apache.lucene.search.PhraseQuery.add(Term)
    Phrase queries should be created once with PhraseQuery.Builder and then considered immutable. See PhraseQuery.Builder.add(Term).
    org.apache.lucene.search.PhraseQuery.add(Term, int)
    Phrase queries should be created once with PhraseQuery.Builder and then considered immutable. See PhraseQuery.Builder.add(Term, int).
    org.apache.lucene.util.BitSet.and(DocIdSetIterator)
    org.apache.lucene.util.BitDocIdSet.Builder.and(DocIdSetIterator)
    org.apache.lucene.util.BitSet.andNot(DocIdSetIterator)
    org.apache.lucene.util.BitDocIdSet.Builder.andNot(DocIdSetIterator)
    org.apache.lucene.util.BitUtil.bitCount(byte)
    Use Integer.bitCount(int) instead.
    org.apache.lucene.util.BitUtil.bitList(byte)
    do not use.
    org.apache.lucene.codecs.CodecUtil.checkEOF(IndexInput)
    Use CodecUtil.checkFooter(org.apache.lucene.store.ChecksumIndexInput) instead, this should only used for files without checksums
    org.apache.lucene.index.TermsEnum.docs(Bits, DocsEnum)
    Use TermsEnum.postings(PostingsEnum) instead
    org.apache.lucene.index.TermsEnum.docs(Bits, DocsEnum, int)
    Use TermsEnum.postings(PostingsEnum, int) instead
    org.apache.lucene.index.TermsEnum.docsAndPositions(Bits, DocsAndPositionsEnum)
    Use TermsEnum.postings(PostingsEnum, int) instead
    org.apache.lucene.index.TermsEnum.docsAndPositions(Bits, DocsAndPositionsEnum, int)
    Use TermsEnum.postings(PostingsEnum, int) instead
    org.apache.lucene.index.SegmentInfos.files(Directory, boolean)
    Use SegmentInfos.files(boolean) instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.FuzzyQuery.floatToEdits(float, int)
    pass integer edit distances instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery.getClauses()
    Use BooleanQuery.clauses().
    org.apache.lucene.util.CharsRef.getUTF16SortedAsUTF8Comparator()
    This comparator is only a transition mechanism
    org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef.getUTF8SortedAsUTF16Comparator()
    This comparator is only a transition mechanism
    org.apache.lucene.index.LiveIndexWriterConfig.getWriteLockTimeout()
    Use SleepingLockWrapper if you want sleeping.
    org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter.isLocked(Directory)
    Use of this method can only lead to race conditions. Try to actually obtain a lock instead.
    org.apache.lucene.store.DataInput.readStringSet()
    Only for reading existing formats. Encode maps with DataOutput.writeSetOfStrings(Set) instead.
    org.apache.lucene.store.DataInput.readStringStringMap()
    Only for reading existing formats. Encode maps with DataOutput.writeMapOfStrings(Map) instead.
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.search(Query, Filter, Collector)
    Use boolean queries with BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.search(Query, Filter, int)
    Use boolean queries with BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.search(Query, Filter, int, Sort)
    Use boolean queries with BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.search(Query, Filter, int, Sort, boolean, boolean)
    Use boolean queries with BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.searchAfter(ScoreDoc, Query, Filter, int)
    Use boolean queries with BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.searchAfter(ScoreDoc, Query, Filter, int, Sort)
    Use boolean queries with BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.searchAfter(ScoreDoc, Query, Filter, int, Sort, boolean, boolean)
    Use boolean queries with BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.index.SegmentCommitInfo.setGenUpdatesFiles(Map>)
    required to support 4.6-4.8 indexes.
    org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery.setMinimumNumberShouldMatch(int)
    Boolean queries should be created once with BooleanQuery.Builder and then considered immutable. See BooleanQuery.Builder.setMinimumNumberShouldMatch(int).
    org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanClause.setOccur(BooleanClause.Occur)
    BooleanClause will be immutable in 6.0.
    org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanClause.setQuery(Query)
    BooleanClause will be immutable in 6.0.
    org.apache.lucene.search.PhraseQuery.setSlop(int)
    Phrase queries should be created once with PhraseQuery.Builder and then considered immutable. See PhraseQuery.Builder.setSlop(int).
    org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriterConfig.setWriteLockTimeout(long)
    Use SleepingLockWrapper if you want sleeping.
    org.apache.lucene.index.LeafReader.termDocsEnum(Term)
    use LeafReader.postings(Term) instead
    org.apache.lucene.index.LeafReader.termPositionsEnum(Term)
    use LeafReader.postings(Term, int) instead
    org.apache.lucene.index.SegmentInfos.toString(Directory)
    Use SegmentInfos.toString() instead.
    org.apache.lucene.index.SegmentInfo.toString(Directory, int)
    Use SegmentInfo.toString(int) instead.
    org.apache.lucene.index.SegmentCommitInfo.toString(Directory, int)
    Use SegmentCommitInfo.toString(int) instead.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field.translateFieldType(Field.Store, Field.Index, Field.TermVector)
    This is here only to ease transition from the pre-4.0 APIs.
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.wrapFilter(Query, Filter)
    Use boolean queries with BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER clauses instead
    org.apache.lucene.store.DataOutput.writeStringSet(Set)
    Use DataOutput.writeMapOfStrings(Map) instead.
    org.apache.lucene.store.DataOutput.writeStringStringMap(Map)
    Use DataOutput.writeMapOfStrings(Map) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery()
    Use the BooleanQuery.Builder class to build boolean queries.
    org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery(boolean)
    Use the BooleanQuery.Builder class to build boolean queries.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field(String, byte[])
    Use StoredField instead.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field(String, byte[], int, int)
    Use StoredField instead.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field(String, Reader)
    Use TextField instead.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field(String, Reader, Field.TermVector)
    Use TextField instead.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field(String, String, Field.Store, Field.Index)
    Use StringField, TextField instead.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field(String, String, Field.Store, Field.Index, Field.TermVector)
    Use StringField, TextField instead.
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field(String, TokenStream)
    Use TextField instead
    org.apache.lucene.document.Field(String, TokenStream, Field.TermVector)
    Use TextField instead
    org.apache.lucene.search.PhraseQuery()
    Use the PhraseQuery.Builder class to build phrase queries.
    org.apache.lucene.search.spans.SpanNearQuery(SpanQuery[], int, boolean, boolean)
    Use SpanNearQuery.SpanNearQuery(SpanQuery[], int, boolean)
